reviews.review_msg: The best prof I've had at SFU! She is so understanding, super easy to get ahold of via email, and very supportive of her students learning. I would very much recommend taking this class with her. The class itself is structured very well and very interesting. 10/10

Zuzana is a super caring and understanding professor, she was always helpful with extensions and genuinely seemed concerned for her students' well-being. The course is engaging and not heavy whatsoever, based on your own interests/life, also super well organized and easy to keep up with
such a sweet and caring professor. she will understand your situtations and give extentions to any work. always ask if you are uncertain and she will definately assit you
Super nice and understanding and is so passionate about the topic so has lots of things to say in order to help you understand. The readings are usually always interesting to read too.

She is so kind. I emailed her about being unable to access something on Canvas & she replied very quickly saying she was so sorry for the inconvenience & if it delayed my work I could take a few extra days to complete the assignment. So compassionate. Take a class with her if you can! She also sends very nice weekly emails to the class.

She is the most absent, terrible prof in the faculty of education. Assigns work with unclear criteria then gets upset when you make a mistake. Don't try asking the prof for help because she never responds to emails or office hour requests and neither does the TA.

Took this course as a gpa booster but it didn't turn out that way. Assignments were graded more harshly than I expected. Dr.Zuzana's feedback was pretty accurate, and she responded to my emails quickly.

Zuzana is the most caring instructor I've ever had and inspires her students with the work done in class. She goes out of her way to ensure students feel safe, respected and valued in class and beyond. She recognizes we all have personal lives and honors that through open communication and genuine care.
The best prof that helped me a lot. 100/10

Zuzana is a very caring professor who truly wants the best for her students. Each class involved working in groups and sharing thoughts in front of the class is not uncommon. Her care for students is very evident as she knows everyone by name and talks directly to students throughout the term. Overall an amazing professor!
Zuzana was super understanding as a prof, and I had the chance to meet her in person! She genuinely wants you to succeed in this class, and is always willing to offer advice and insight in your work.

Zuzana was hands down the best professor I have had in my 4 years at sfu, and im not even an education major. she is beyond kind and provides you with the coolest class that pushes you to think critically about yourself and reflect on who you are as a person and what you need in order to succeed in life. Best class ever, 10/10 recommend to take it!

Zuzana is the sweetest prof I have encountered at SFU throughout my entire undergrad. She makes lectures and learning meaningful and pertinent to students' lives. She provides helpful constructive feedback and is a pleasure to have as a professor.
She is an amazing prof and is always trying to inspire her students. She gives great feedback on assignments and the overall workload is light. I recommend taking a class with her

Zuzana was a breath of fresh air as a professor. She treated the class with such care, empathy, and kindness and it did not go unnoticed. She was always very organized and on top of things with weekly emails outlining what was due coming up etc. Zuzana also always provided overall feedback and genuinely wanted us to do our best! Highly recommend :)

Zuzana is an incredibly thoughtful and caring person. Her feedback is detailed and she plans assignments according to students' needs. She is very accessible outside of class and will respond to emails quickly. Occasional tech difficulties. Show up, participate, do the work and you'll get a good grade. Thank you Zuzana for a wonderful semester!
She is a perfect professor! Her classes are interesting and she is very patient to help every student!
